MonsterTrait.Name: Beast Hunter
MonsterTrait.Text: The elvish veteran archer has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track beasts and on Intelligence (Nature) checks to recall information about beasts.

MonsterTrait.Name: Fey Ancestry
MonsterTrait.Text: The elvish veteran archer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the elvish archer to sleep.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: The elvish veteran archer has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The elvish veteran archer's weapon attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Stealthy Traveler
MonsterTrait.Text: The elvish veteran archer can use Stealth while traveling at a normal pace.

MonsterTrait.Name: Surprise Attack
MonsterTrait.Text: If the elvish veteran archer surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The elvish veteran archer makes two melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Longbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Volley (Recharge 6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The elvish archer makes one ranged attack against every enemy within 10 feet of a point it can see.
